what: Generic data types and utilities for R
title: Generic data types and utilities for R
text: goal gendatypes provide generic data structures utilities restricting usage lists one specific generic class. Among utilities: extend list classes list doen’t contain provided class name introduce S3 %??% default works similar null coalescing operator C#, however can overriden.

title: Generic data types and utilities for R
text: Currently package deployed CRAN. installation use install_github command devtools package. install specific version use ref option provide branch tag name. Release tags use 4 numbers version v prefix.

title: Generic data types and utilities for R
Typed list — as.typed_list
text: Typed list ensures items list type. However, ducktyping takes place, element target class mean structure items list.
